summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Central Freeway Park project (Ordinance 98854) and the East Plaza Parking Garage, abandoning unexpended balances in appropriations herefore made from the Emergency Fund by Ordinances 99450 and 100543 and making an appropriation from the Central Freeway Municipal Garage Improvement Fund for reimbursement of the Emergency Fund and for initial and second phase design work in connection with said Garage.
